request.description:
Route for first user creation. When user firstly comes to our bot you should use it to generates his or her account.

That endpoint will return generated profile data and API token

response.name: Try create user with duplicate ID

request.description: Endpoint for patching main user information. If u r looking for updating diet or macronutrients params use the Params.set method.
Return current logged in user data.
Return current logged in user diet params
Route is used for setting diet and macronutrients params.
Use it to renew token for user or to check does user have an account (it returns 401 if doesnt)
Returns last generated diet for current user

Run alghorithm with provided params.

Use it for custom diet generation OR for replacing dishes in generated diet.

If you need to replace any dish in generated menu just provide params from Params.get and add dish which must be replace to excludeDIsh arr.

body.raw:
{
    "idealMicronutrients": {
        "calories": 2000, //Full amount of calories (will be in [C*0.99; C*1.01])

        "minProtein": 10, //Bottom boundary of protein
        "maxProtein": 200, //Top boundary of protein

        "minFat": 20, //Bottom boundary of fat
        "maxFat": 200, //Top boundary of fat
        
        "minCarbohydrates": 30, //Bottom boundary of carbohydrates
        "maxCarbohydrates": 200, //Top boundary of carbohydrates
        
        "minCellulose": 0, //Bottom boundary of cellulose
        "maxCellulose": 50 //Top boundary of cellulose
    },
    "diet": 0, //Diet ID
    "calories": 2000, //Amount of calories for auto calculate micronutrients
    "excludeDishes": [1000], //Array of excluded dishes (used for replacement requests)
    "eatings": [
        {
            "name": "test1", //Here you can specify anything field will return in answer
            "size": 0.4, //Size of eating 0.4 * fullAmountOfCalories
            "type": 1, //Dish type field
            "difficulty": 0, //How difficult to cook dishes (1..5) based on timeToCook
            /*
                1 -> DishModel.timeToCook lessEq 5
                2 -> DishModel.timeToCook lessEq 15
                3 -> DishModel.timeToCook lessEq 30
                4 -> DishModel.timeToCook lessEq 45
                5 -> DishModel.timeToCook lessEq 60
                else -> DishModel.timeToCook lessEq 1000
            */


            "dishCount": 0 //Dish count in current eating
        },
        {
            "name": "test2",
            "size": 0.5,
            "type": 2,
            "difficulty": 3,
            "dishCount": 2
        },
        {
            "name": "test3",
            "size": 0.1,
            "type": 0,
            "difficulty": 0,
            "dishCount": 1
        }
    ]
}

request.description: Calculate diet by current user params.

Routes for mapping ingredient with custom measures by their count.

  
You must provide array of objects, every object must include ingredient ID and its count. After that you ll get array of objects which map ingredientId with its measure id. Measure Id can be zero, it means that there are no custom measures for such count and you should use native measures (ml or grams)
